Class UserRegistry

java.lang.Object
model.UserRegistry
public class UserRegistry extends Object
Central database for all users in the system. Uses the Singleton pattern - only one instance exists throughout the application. Manages in-memory user storage and retrieval. Note: CSV persistence is handled by UserCsvHandler in utils/csv/ (MVC compliance).
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static UserRegistry getInstance()
      Get the single instance of UserRegistry. Called from anywhere in the app that needs to access user data.
      Returns:
      the singleton UserRegistry instance

    • register

      public boolean register(User user)
      Add a new user to the registry. Called from InternshipApp when loading users from CSV files.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to register
      Returns:
      true if registration successful, false otherwise

    • findById

      public User findById(String userID)
      Find a user by their ID. Called from LoginController during login and password changes.
      Parameters:
      userID - the user ID to search for
      Returns:
      the User object if found, null otherwise

    • getAllUsers

      public Collection<User> getAllUsers()
      Get all users in the system. Used for clearing application references when reloading from CSV.
      Returns:
      collection of all users

    • getAllCompanyReps

      public List<CompanyRepresentative> getAllCompanyReps()
      Get all company representatives in the system. Called from StaffController to show the list of company reps for approval/rejection.
      Returns:
      list of all company representatives
